instruction: Make sparkline chart line by line

single-action: `KEY_DOWN` on the start item in whole lines and columns of source data
`DRAG_TO`the end item in whole lines and columns to select all the lines and columns of source data
`KEY_UP` on the end item in whole lines and columns of source data
`CLICK` 'turn right' icon on the top right in up pannel to find the tab of Sparkline on top
`CLICK` the tab of Sparkline on top
`CLICK` Line in the Sparklines group in the drop done menu
`KEY_DOWN` on the start item in whole lines and columns of target locations
`DRAG_TO`the end item in whole lines and columns to select all the lines and columns of target locations
`KEY_UP` on the end item in whole lines and columns of target locations
grouped-action: `KEY_DOWN` on the start item in whole lines and columns of source data
`DRAG_TO`the end item in whole lines and columns to select all the lines and columns of source data
`KEY_UP` on the end item in whole lines and columns of source data
`CLICK` 'turn right' icon on the top right in up pannel to find the tab of Sparkline on top
`CLICK` the tab of Sparkline on top
`CLICK` Line in the Sparklines group in the drop done menu
`KEY_DOWN` on the start item in whole lines and columns of target locations
`DRAG_TO`the end item in whole lines and columns to select all the lines and columns of target locations
`KEY_UP` on the end item in whole lines and columns of target locations
